the game has a creepy atmosphere to it

tl;dr - Gravity Gun go brr. Even if you aren't normally into FPS, this is one you really need to experience.

The quintessential FPS. Considering it exists partially to show off the physics of the Source 2 engine, there's a lot of variety to be had. You'll be driving hovercraft through abandoned rivers, cleaving zombies with sawblades, storming the beach with the local wildlife at your back and put into all other sorts of situations that really make this game stand the test of time.

Sure it's got it's faults, but considering it's of the same vintage as Portal and TF2, and those two still hold up today then you might as well see why the Orange Box is so iconic.
I'm almost 100% sure everyone knows about this game so I don't have to give an explanation really. I recommend getting it now while its on sale than later, you wont regret it.

Eksileri

-Oyunun nereye gideceƒüinizi ne yapacaƒüƒ±nƒ±zƒ± sƒ±r gibi saklamasƒ±. Ne bir quest marker var ne ba≈üka bir ≈üey. Bazƒ± b√∂l√ºmlerdeki bulmacalar o derece sa√ßma ki kafayƒ± sƒ±yƒ±rƒ±rsƒ±nƒ±z. Ek bulmacalarƒ±n dƒ±≈üƒ±nda oyunun kendiside bulmaca gibi ilerliyor zaten.

D√ºmd√ºz ilerliyor yani √∂yle. Tamam bir yere gitmeye √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±yor ama bir nedeni yok. Hatta valve b√ºy√ºk ihtimalle en sonunda fark etmi≈ü ki bunu. Son b√∂l√ºmde bir karakter Gordon ne yapmaya √ßalƒ±≈ütƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ± sen bile bilmiyorsun tarzƒ±nda kinayeli bir lafla iƒüneliyor.

Sonu√ß:

Karde≈üim alƒ±n oynayƒ±n. Fiyatƒ± deh≈üet ucuz. Kart satarak bile √ßƒ±kar parasƒ±. Mis gibi 12-13 saatlik oyun oynarsƒ±nƒ±z. Benim tavsiyem The Orange Box paketiyle alƒ±n. Hem daha ucuza gelir hem b√ºt√ºn seri tamamlanƒ±r.

Honestamente yo ven√≠a con las expectativas muy altas para este juego, y no me ha decepcionado, de hecho, todo lo contrario, me ha gustado mucho m√°s de lo que esperaba la verdad. En las primeras misiones simplemente parec√≠a un Half-Life 1 pero con mejores gr√°ficos (ya sab√©is, los t√≠picos puzzles, algo de parkour, disparar a todo lo que se mueva...) pero a lo largo que lo he estado jugando simplemente me ha parecido que la calidad incrementaba gradualmente y en mi opini√≥n esto contin√∫a hasta el final, con las √∫ltimas misiones siendo las m√°s tensas y emocionantes de todas, de hecho, la pen√∫ltima realmente me hizo pensar que realmente lo que estaba haciendo estaba mal y deber√≠a simplemente entregarme (incluso despu√©s de todas las cosas horribles que hab√≠a visto por parte de los Combine). Con lo que me refiero a que las primeras misiones no eran tan buenas es que, por ejemplo, hab√≠a una misi√≥n que se me hizo muuuuy larga, esta es la de la lancha motora (y esto que voy a decir tambi√©n se aplica para la del coche), pero no porque me estuviese aburriendo, si no porque simplemente quer√≠a llegar al sitio al que deb√≠a ir, estaba solo y me tem√≠a que se me pod√≠a aparecer cualquier cosa en cualquier momento... ¬°Estaba jodidamente asustado! Y opino que ese era el motivo de esas misiones, la INMERSI√ìN. Esa palabra b√°sicamente resume este juego, es incre√≠blemente inmersivo, y eso que el original ya lo era, pero este lo lleva a otro puto extremo, y esto es por el conjunto de el ambiente, la historia, las estrechas relaciones que puedes llegar a forjar con unos personajes que apenas de conocer, y por supuest√≠simo, las F√çSICAS. Este es otro punto fuerte de el juego, tiene un motor de f√≠sicas de la hostia que no solo era revolucionario para la √©poca si no que sigue siendo excelente para juegos de hoy en d√≠a, los puzzles que tienes que resolver us√°ndolas causan que las f√≠sicas se vuelvan una mec√°nica que causa una inmersi√≥n total al hacerte sentir que esto podr√≠as estar haci√©ndolo en la vida real (as√≠ de realistas son las mec√°nicas). Y otro punto fuerte es el misterio, desde la misteriosa y complicada trama (y lore) de Half-Life (en donde se podr√≠a incluir qu√©/qui√©n es GMan, qu√© poderes tiene, hay diferentes dimensiones id√©nticas a esta, por lo que menciona el Dr. Breen al final del juego y por Half-Life Alyx parece que s√≠ pero no se sabe a cien por cien, la conexi√≥n entre este y diferentes juegos de la saga, como Portal 1 y 2, existe el viaje temporal o simplemente es algo totalmente diferente que causa una sensaci√≥n parecida al viaje temporal...) pasando por los misteriosos l√≠deres Combine, los misteriosos m√©todos que utilizan para teletransportarse... Es una pregunta tras otra, esto podr√≠a resultar desconcertante si simplemente te lo resumo, pero el experimentarlo es algo completamente diferente y aunque yo no soy capaz de resolver todos estos misterios (de algunos s√≠ que se sabe la respuesta, otros tienen respuestas m√°s ambiguas y otras directamente tienen decenas de posibles de respuestas ya que Valve quiere dejar todo lo m√°s ambiguo posible para futuras entregas que explican esto de manera can√≥nica) s√≠ que puedo decirte que el conjunto de todo lo anterior (la trama, el lore, los personajes y tus relaciones con ellos y las suya entre ellos, las f√≠sicas y el misterio) causan una experiencia m√°s inmersiva imposible que te causar√° una experiencia incre√≠ble ya seas una persona como yo que le encanta quedarse con todos los detalles de la trama y as√≠ ir descifrando el lore tras esto, o simplemente seas una persona que quiere probar (o rejugar) una Leyenda que realmente se ha ganado este t√≠tulo. En pocas palabras, este juego probablemente sea uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, y esto no son simplemente palabras porque cr√©eme he jugado demasiados, si no no tendr√≠a la m√≠ninima experiencia necesaria para escribir esto, as√≠ que creedme, necesit√°is jugar esto.
This games good, I hope people play it for many generations to come!

Half-Life 2 is one of the greatest games ever made, the atmosphere, the physics, the story, its a helluva ride for short. Even though it was made in 2004, it still holds up to this day in terms of graphics and gameplay, unlike other games from that era. The community support is incredible, if you finished the story for the 10th time, you can get some mods to have a new experience. It has something for almost everybody, some of the monsters from the previous game, the new Combine enemies, City 17 and of course, "The One Free Man" and his trusty crowbar. Its a very big evolution since Half Life 1, which released way back in 1998, the new Source engine and the new facial expressions make this game a masterpiece. Overall 10/10.
So wake up Mr. Freeman, wake up and play this amazing game...

Probably the greatest FPS game ever made and its still awesome. the graphics, sound design, voice acting, story, gameplay almost every aspect of the game is at its finest. Its revolutionary just as its prequel. The Strider stages were a bit frustrating otherwise from the beginning to the end its top notch FPS fun 

10/10, Recommended

Literally the god of pc games

In 1998, there was nothing. And then, there was the original half life, a game I also love. Revolutionary in the fact that you, as Scientist Gordon Freeman, were in the story. No, text boxes, no cut scenes, and you only lose control of your character for a split second. Then, in 2004, valve hit gold once again, and even revolutionized the same industry they had before, just as much as they had before. With a dynamic physics engine, and an emphasis on characterization, Half-Life 2 is a master piece, and my favorite game of all time.
     This is the source engines debut game, and while physics had been in games before, here's a game where they were really taken advantage of, and boy, is it glorious. This is despite a pinch of jank, which can be either annoying or humorous. But, what the game really excels at for me is the story and characters. The story really picks up during and after the chapter "Nova Prospekt". It is intense, beautiful, and the ending knocked the wind out of me. While Half-Life 2 Episode 2 is in my opinion, better with characters, all of them are super solid in this (Barney and Alyx are the best). 
     The graphics have aged like fine wine, the story is a masterpiece, stop reading reviews and get the damn game, its only 10 bucks.

Half Life 2 is a great experience. The environments are very interesting, and the way the maps are built allow you to experiment with different weapons and different objects. The gravity gun is what makes this game interesting, as almost any object around you can be used as a weapon. It just depends on whether you're at the right place at the right time. The shooting may not feel the best but it definitely feels rewarding to kill an enemy with a certain weapon. The levels are very well done and you are able to perform speedrunning techniques still. The game also has graphics that aren't the best but still don't look bad either. The graphics still definitely hold up today and its impressive what Valve was able to accomplish. The things I didn't like about this game were parts like the interactive cutscenes and how the shooting wasn't how you'd expect for a first person shooter. Other than that, 9/10.
